breads.name: Baguette
breads.description: Real French Baguette with crisp golden brown crust and soft and chewy interior

breads.name: North Sea Rye
breads.description: Dark, dense, and seedy, and in addition to heft that'll keep you going, it's packed with a wholesome flavor that's part rye, part sourdough.

breads.name: Bread Rolls
breads.description: These bread rolls are a favorite at home and good to be paired with the evening chai.

breads.name: Country Loaf
breads.description: Fill the house with the aroma of freshly baked bread with this delicious artisan-style loaf.

breads.name: Olive Loaf
breads.description: Salty olives add a depth of flavor to this rustic bread.

breads.name: Festive Challah
breads.description: Authentic seeded rye, crisp and delicious. Comes dotted with a rainbow of sesame, poppy, sunflower, pumpkin and nigella seeds.

brownies.name: Baker's Choice Bars Assortment
brownies.description: A beautiful and delicious assortment of Magnolia Bakery’s double fudge brownies, chocolate chunk blondies and magic cookie bars.

brownies.name: Chocolate Chunk Blondies
brownies.description: Traditional blond brownies made with brown sugar, butter and chocolate chunks.

brownies.name: Magic Cookie Bars
brownies.description: Graham cracker crust with chocolate chips, walnuts and coconut topped with sweetened condensed milk then baked.

cakes.name: Raseberry Lemon Cake
cakes.description: Vanilla crème fraîche cake layered with raspberry Swiss meringue buttercream and lemon curd filling, covered with raspberry buttercream.

cakes.name: Hazelnet Cake
cakes.description: Vanilla crème fraîche cake filled and frosted with hazelnut Swiss meringue buttercream and hazelnut praline, topped with a bittersweet chocolate glaze.

cakes.name: Very Vanilla Cake
cakes.description: Our moist vanilla crème fraîche cake filled and frosted with vanilla Swiss meringue buttercream.

cakes.name: Pstachio Praline Cake
cakes.description: Vanilla crème fraîche cake filled and frosted with pistachio Swiss meringue buttercream and pistachio praline.

cakes.name: Banans Foster Cake
cakes.description: Banana cake layered with cinnamon rum Swiss meringue buttercream, caramel and walnuts.

cakes.name: Salted Caramel Cake
cakes.description: Chocolate cake layered with salted caramel and frosted with Belgian chocolate ganache.

cakes.name: Red Velvet Cake
cakes.description: Our moist red velvet cake filled and frosted with cream cheese frosting.

cookies.name: Sea Salt Caramel Cookie
cookies.description: A thick Chocolate chunk cookie topped with homemade caramel candy and sea salt.

cookies.name: Peanut Butter Cookies
cookies.description: Scrumptious peanut butter cookies made with three layers of peanut butter, peanut butter chips and peanuts.

cookies.name: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
cookies.description: Filled with warm spices, oats and raisins. A wholesome and delicious classic.

cookies.name: Cranberry Chocolate Chunk Cookies
cookies.description: Extra large chocolate cookies with white chocolate chunks, dried cranberries and toasted pecans. Soft and chewy this cookie is amazing.

cookies.name: Coconut Macaroons with Chocolate
cookies.description: A wonderfully sweet coconut flavor with a crisp exterior and a soft and chewy texture, dipped in chocolate.

cookies.name: Coconut Macaroons
cookies.description: A wonderfully sweet coconut flavor with a crisp exterior and a soft, chewy interior.

candy.name: Pufflettes
candy.description: Like inverted, miniature, snow-capped mountains, the base of each proud Pufflette treat is a brilliant white hue supporting a brightly colored peak.

candy.name: Petite Swirly Ripple Lollipops
candy.description: We offer this cornucopia of colors to nurture your superpower taste buds, no goat horn required.

candy.name: Gummy Rainforest Frogs
candy.description: Shaped and textured to replicate real frogs, these exotic tropical rainforest gummy frogs feature an assortment of bright colors and perky fruit flavor combinations.
